title: Cofagrigus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curse: Choose a player to haunt, placing a **Curse** on them. You can multitask one other ability with this one. (âˆž uses)
- Scary Face: Stand at the door of a player's house tonight. All people who tried targeting them tonight will instead visit themselves. If used on a non-Pokemon, the target will also visit themselves. (3 uses)
- Destiny Bond: Choose a player. When you die, you'll deal them an astral Powerful attack the following night post-mortem. You'll bypass protective effects. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Night Shade: Your visits use Astral. Whenever a fellow Pokemember visits a **Cursed** target, their visit will use Astral as well.
- Crafty Shield: You have a coffin shield which grants you Basic defense, absorbed upon being attacked.
- Mummy: Whenever a Pokemember is hanged or otherwise dies, all **Cursed** players are roleblocked the following night. This attribute applies post-mortem.
